actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to provide that the Federal Government shall assume 100 per centum of all Federal, State, and local welfare costs.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare to pay all costs incurred by any State or local government in carrying out a welfare or public assistance program, including titles I (Old-Age Assistance and Medical Assistance for the Aged), IV (Aid to Families with Dependent Children and for Child Welfare Services), V (Maternal and Child Health), X (Aid to the Blind), XI (General Provisions and Professional Standards Review), XIV (Aid to the Permanently and Totally Disabled), XVI (Supplemental Security Income), or XX (Grants to States for Services) of the Social Security Act.

titles.title: A bill to provide that the Federal Government shall assume 100 per centum of all Federal, State, and local welfare costs.
